content:
Hi! I tried to edit the information of my registered client app, but got an unexpected 403: Forbidden Error: No access rights, with the message There was an error processing your request. The server said: Insufficient access rights for the resource
Invalid client or registration access token.
I also tried to create a brand new client, which seems to succeed, but then editing that client also fails with the same error.
This will be fixed in next release. Someone with admin-powers can currently edit the scopes before that.
Thanks @Eeva Turkka ! Has the date for the next release been fixed?
Hi, next Sandbox release will be soon, in one or two weeks!

Thanks @Eeva Turkka ! Has the date for the next release been fixed?

Sandbox release has been made and updating clients should be possible.
